name: landing-page
description: Static landing page for La Mentora Study Planner

scripts.build: npm run copy-assets && npm run process-html
scripts.copy-assets: mkdir -p dist && cp -r src/assets dist/ && cp -r ../shared-ui-library/src/styles dist/shared
scripts.dev: npm run build && cd dist && python3 -m http.server 8080
